Do you want to change the level?

question

What is the game's rule?

What is the difference between levels?

What is the difference between tools?

rule

  1. Each game has a bomb number
  2. Any player only can guess a number within the valid range
  3. You have 30 seconds to guess the number or it will choose a random number for you
  4. If you guess the bomb number, the game is over
  5. You can use different tools to avoid guessing the number
  6. Each of the other computer players will have three tool counts for each level
  7. If one of the other players guesses the bomb number
    1. The remaining players can use one more tool
    2. A new bomb number is generated
    3. A new valid number range is reset
  8. You can only win the game if all of the other players lose

different level

easy

Having three counts available for each different tool

medium

Having two counts available for each different tool

hard

Having one counts available for each different tool

tool

assign

Assign one of the players to stand in for you in guessing the number

pass

Move on to the next player without having to guess a number

u-turn

Pass the current guessing round and return to the previous player
